mutants.code:
def min_possible_value_after_swaps(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        combined = A - B
        combined.sort()
        min_diff = float('inf')
        for i in range(N + 1):
            min_diff = min(min_diff, combined[i + N - 1] - combined[i])
        results.append(min_diff)
    return results

def min_possible_value_after_swaps(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A, B) = case
        combined = A * B
        combined.sort()
        min_diff = float('inf')
        for i in range(N + 1):
            min_diff = min(min_diff, combined[i + N - 1] - combined[i])
        results.append(min_diff)
    return results
